tests.name: Categories should create a new category
Categories should retrieve a newly created category by its ID
Categories should return null if category does not exist
Categories should get all categories
Categories should load a category route
Categories should get active users
Categories should return nested children categories
Categories Categories.getRecentTopicReplies should not throw
Categories .getCategoryTopics should return a list of topics
Categories .getCategoryTopics should return a list of topics by a specific user
Categories Categories.moveRecentReplies should move posts from one category to another
Categories api/socket methods should get recent replies in category
Categories api/socket methods should get categories
Categories api/socket methods should get watched categories
Categories api/socket methods should load more topics
Categories api/socket methods should not show deleted topic titles
Categories api/socket methods should load topic count
Categories api/socket methods should load category by privilege
Categories api/socket methods should get move categories
Categories api/socket methods should ignore category
Categories api/socket methods should watch category
Categories api/socket methods should error if watch state does not exist
Categories api/socket methods should check if user is moderator
Categories api/socket methods should get category data
Categories admin api/socket methods should return error with invalid data
Categories admin api/socket methods should error if you try to set parent as self
Categories admin api/socket methods should error if you try to set child as parent
Categories admin api/socket methods should update category data
Categories admin api/socket methods should properly order categories
Categories admin api/socket methods should not remove category from parent if parent is set again to same category
Categories admin api/socket methods should purge category
Categories admin api/socket methods should get all category names
Categories admin api/socket methods should give privilege
Categories admin api/socket methods should remove privilege
Categories admin api/socket methods should get privilege settings
Categories admin api/socket methods should copy privileges to children
Categories admin api/socket methods should create category with settings from
Categories admin api/socket methods should copy settings from
Categories admin api/socket methods should copy privileges from another category
Categories admin api/socket methods should copy privileges from another category for a single group
Categories tag whitelist should error if data is invalid
Categories tag whitelist should return true if category whitelist is empty
Categories tag whitelist should add tags to category whitelist
Categories tag whitelist should return false if category whitelist does not have tag
Categories tag whitelist should return true if category whitelist has tag
Categories tag whitelist should post a topic with only allowed tags
Categories privileges should return empty array if uids is empty array
Categories privileges should filter uids by privilege
Categories privileges should load category user privileges
Categories privileges should load global user privileges
Categories privileges should load category group privileges
Categories privileges should load global group privileges
Categories privileges should return false if cid is falsy
Categories privileges Categories.getModeratorUids should retrieve all users with moderator bit in category privilege
Categories privileges Categories.getModeratorUids should not fail when there are multiple groups
Categories privileges Categories.getModeratorUids should not return moderators of disabled categories
Categories getTopicIds should get topic ids with filter
